message.content:
I need to identify the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period.

This represents accounts payable increases, which would be shown in the "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" line item on the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided:
- "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" shows 0.00

This means there was no change in accounts payable during this period, so there was no addition to the amount owed by the entity for goods or services.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '0.00'} }
```
